name: graphql-sequelize
description: GraphQL & Relay for MySQL & Postgres via Sequelize

scripts.prepublish: npm run check && npm run build
scripts.check: npm run lint && npm run test:unit
scripts.build: rm -rf lib/* && babel src --ignore test --out-dir lib
scripts.test: npm run test:unit && npm run test:docker
scripts.test:docker: DIALECT=${DIALECT:=postgres} docker-compose run dev /bin/sh -c "npm run test:integration"
scripts.psql: docker run -it --link graphqlsequelize_postgres_1:postgres --rm postgres:9.4 sh -c 'PGPASSWORD=graphql_sequelize_test exec psql -h "$POSTGRES_PORT_5432_TCP_ADDR" -p "$POSTGRES_PORT_5432_TCP_PORT" -U graphql_sequelize_test'

author: Mick Hansen <maker@mhansen.io>
